text.p: Secondhand tonnage brokers reported the sale of the following vessels.
Some of these sales may not be final as they may be subject to survey, inspection or other conditions.
LATE REPORTED SALES THAT TOOK PLACE IN APRIL.
Jay Laxmi - (built 1974) 26,513 dwt sold for $172 plt delivery India.
Michalis V - (built 1972) 39,891 dwt sold for $172 plt delivery India.
Baltic Trident - (built 1974) 61,398 dwt sold for $172 plt delivery India.
Captain Peter V - (built 1973) 13,660 dwt sold for $172 plt delivery India.
Umang - (built 1973) 13,563 dwt sold for $172 plt delivery India.
Pyong Chon - (built 1971) 15,136 dwt sold for $177.5 plt delivery India.
Song Rim - (built 1971) 15,797 dwt sold for $180 plt delivery India.
Manley Appledore - (built 1971) 16,920 dwt sold for $185 plt delivery India.
Toshka - (built 1972) 10,700 dwt sold for $172 plt delivery asis Mideast Gulf.
